description: "The Star Wars franchise's newest addition takes us into a Mandalorian bounty hunter's adventures in a post-Galactic Empire era. In my opinion, it is one of the best franchise sagas so far as it is a great combination of action, humor, familiar faces, and storytelling that will immediately captivate you. "Mandoâ€™s" commitment to his missions is especially encouraging and sets an example for our everyday lives."
